reviews.review_text: I manage large construction projects across Canada, but when it came to renovating my own condo I was nervous about the quality of trade I would get for a small space. I wish that every sub trade was as strong as BC Floors. Keit the project manager was communicative and professional. She kept me regularly up to date through texts and phone calls throughout the work. The workers were respectful and diligent. We installed a new lvt floor. BC Floors looked after the demolition and new install. The team met an aggressive timeline and the final product is extremely well done. 10/10
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: I had existing floors refinished, carpets replaced by engineered hardwood, and laminate floors installed in the basement. I strongly recommend using BC Floors. Nikita coordinated all aspects of the project, providing excellent guidance through the planning phase while providing regular updates throughout the work. The workmanship is high quality, and we are happy with our floors.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much for your kind words

reviews.review_text: Recently, BC Floors completed a superb flooring project at my home. Lawrence, the project manager organized every detail with precision, expedience in a highly organized manner. From the project onset of determining measurements and multiple components to the installation finality, a meticulous approach occurred throughout each task. The projects professional installers, Jhoemar and Juan completed my vinyl sheet installations with perfection. Their politeness, hard work ethic, and installation knowledge was remarkable. BC Floors is a Five Star company that most certainly places customers as their priority! Lawrence is a highly detailed and professional project manager who is extremely knowledgeable with customers requirements. I very much recommend BC Floors for any of your flooring needs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: I found Keit and her colleagues at BC Floors to be professional, reliable, and honest.   Her crew were very experienced and courteous, and were a pleasure to deal with during my project. Loving my new hardwood floors, and would recommend BC Floors without any hesitation!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: I recently had a very good experience using Lawrence (the project manager) and his team (led by Jhoemar the installer) at BC Floors on a home renovation project that Im working on in Coquitlam. They are one of the most professional, easy-to-deal with and reliable carpet supply-and-install companies that you will find in Vancouver. If you want a quality product coupled with hassle and headache-free service, then BC Floors is the place to go.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much for your kind words

reviews.review_text: I was happy I connected with Lawrence to do our floors. He is a great project manager, easy to communicate with and is respectful of everyone s time frame. He brought in Emerson and Jhoemar who did a great removal and installation job and have eye for detail; respectful and great professionals to work with.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much for your kind words

reviews.review_text: Im glad to share my positive experience of working with Keit at BC FLOORS during the purchase of Coswick flooring for my new house. Keits service was outstanding from product selection and finally delivery. What really stood out was her dedication to solving problems When concerns arose about color discrepancies in the flooring, Keit engaged with the supplier to address the issue and ensure our satisfaction were exceptional. I highly recommend Keit at BC FLOOR. Her professionalism and customer focus made our project a success. Thanks to her, we have fantastic Coswick flooring and a stress-free experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: I had fantastic experience with BC Floors. They transformed my bedroom from carpet to beautiful vinyl flooring. Their wide vinyl selection, fast installers, and excellent pricing made it a seamless process. Highly recommended for their quality and efficiency.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: I was in a bit of a situation as the staircase flooring was damaged and I needed a fast turnaround to have new flooring installed and fast.  Nik the project manager helped me pick out the best and most effective materials for my needs after hours as I could not make it during business hours.  Nik make the whole process from material selection, install and payment an easy process and everything was done in a couple of days.  I would recommend BC Floors anytime and your in good hands with Nik and his team.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: We had an excellent experience, from start to finish, working with Lawrence Gutierrez (Project Manager) and BC Floors. Lawrence provided much needed information, clearly and respectfully, on all aspects of our flooring project. He was always attentive, timely, factual and considerate of my budget.We couldnt be more pleased with the floors that were installed, the installers Juan and JhoeMar who did the work, and the speed with which the project was completed. In these days of poor customer service, staff shortages and shabby workmanship, Lawrence and BC Floors stand out as exceptional.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: I needed to replace the carpeting on two sets of stairs with laminate flooring. I needed to get the job done quickly. Keit was able to come by and give an estimate the very next day. The estimate was very reasonable and better yet, I was able to book the job within a short time frame, with work finished off in less than a week from first contact. Valentine performed the installation. This man was excellent in every regard. He was punctual, very polite, worked extremely efficiently while keeping the work area spotless, and the quality of his work was top-notch. Afterwards, Keit came by again to check the condition of the work and to check if I had any concerns. I can happily say that I had no concerns at all. I am very happy with the work performed and would gladly recommend BC Floors! Thank you Keit and Valentine! Top notch service!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: Our recent carpet installation project was very professional, from the initial consultation with our sales manager Nikita, to the actual installation by our installer Tamim.  We love our new Shaw Pet Perfect carpet.  Tamim did an excellent job of installing the carpet and the finished rooms are flawless.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: We hired BC floors to remove some carpets and refinish the underlying hardwood floors, as well as re-do carpets on stairs. They were helpful and easy to coordinate with, and did a great and expeditious job with the work. Id gladly recommend them to others!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: We had the main floor and two stair cases installed with vinyl planks recently. Keit was very helpful and easy to deal with from my first visit to the show room and all throughout the installation process. Emerson, Caloy, and Juan were very respectful of our property, knowledgeable, and answered all the questions we had. Caloy and Juan took great care of installing the floor. Caloy presented himself not only as a knowledgeable installer but also as a craftsperson customizing the stair installation. Thank you all and we wish you all the best!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: Hi Keit, I am pleased to report that the vinyl flooring that BC Floors ordered and installed in Guardian Angels church was a very smooth process with excellent support from the staff at BC Floors, especially from you, Keit Gutierrez. Also the installation went like clock-work, precise and with proper workmanship, including removing and reinstalling the heavy oak pews back in its exact position. We at Guardian Angels parish have nothing but praise for the organization and installation of this beautiful flooring. With kind regards, Arie Smits, coordinator and chair of the GA church Building Committee.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: The team from BC Floors were great - they were friendly, worked hard, and the final results were excellent. Keit managed the project well and I wouldnt hesitate to work them all again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much for your kind words

reviews.review_text: We love the flooring BC Floors installed. It looks great, the workmanship is impressive, and we could not be more pleased. Other residents in our building came by to see the work, and they loved it too. The project manager, Lawrence, was extremely helpful and professional, courteous and pleasant to deal with. The installers were efficient and expert. Unlike many flooring companies, at BC Floors the installers are employees, not subcontractors. Thats important because it means BC Floors stands behind the work. We highly recommend the company.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: Excellent job!! We were delighted to work with Nikita and his team. The service was outstanding, the project was completed on time, and at all times they were making sure we were satisfied with the service and the product. I am a very happy customer.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: We had BC Floors replace the carpet on our stairs with laminate and risers.  They did a wonderful job on the work, were very considerate and cheerful while doing the work, and left our house in garage (where they did most of the cutting) nearly as clean as when they arrived.  Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for this service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much Clay

reviews.review_text: BC Floors did an excellen job in replacing our carpets with hardwood floor. From the initial meeting with Nikita through materials delivery and installation everything went well, without delays or missed schedules. Strongly recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: We had BC Floors replace the floors in our condo. Kiet was a great help in her knowledge as well as getting the project done very quickly. The installers did an amazing job. I would highly recommend them for your flooring needs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: Sometimes, finding a good contractor to do your flooring, especially in todays supply chain constricted world can be a difficult thing. So finding a contractor, that also supplies the product was an amazing discovery. When I first contacted the company, I was introduced to their account manager, Keit, and I have to say that Keit went beyond the scope of her work to ensure that as a customer, everything was laid out in a transparent and clear manner. She replied to all my inquiries in a professional and knowledgeable way. It was also very convenient that BC floors acted as a one stop shop, that had almost every type of flooring you can think of. I found their prices to be very competitive, and for the quality and speed of the work done, you are getting your moneys worth. I would certainly recommend BC flooring in the future, and if your lucky enough to get Keit as your account manager, it will make the whole renovation/new build process much more seamless.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much for your kind words.

reviews.review_text: BC floors has done an amazing job with the removal and disposal of our carpet and installation of our hardwood floors. This tedious process was possible due to Emerson and Juan s hard work and attention to detail - as well as Keit and Amy s communication and problem solving capabilities. Great work team and thank you for the amazing work!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: Contacted BC floors for a quote to change older tile floors and Keit came to our home to show us multiple samples,  take measurements,  and provide a detailed quote for the work of removing the existing tile , leveling the floor, and installing a new floor. Keit did an outstanding job of explaining everything involved with our choice of cork floors. The job was started within a week and the installer , Emerson, was fast, meticulous and we were extremely pleased with the look of the completed floor.  Superb job!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your kind words. I ll let Keit and Emerson know

reviews.review_text: We had our floor done with BC Floor in July 2015. They did a great job on bringing the floors in our 80+ year old house back to life. What I like about BC Floor is that they talk you through everything they are going to do and make sure you are comfortable.  They were very helpful and patient in helping us decide on what we want. They were also very accommodating to our schedule, and did the job in timely manner. Were very happy with the work they did and will hire them again in the future when were ready to replace the ceramic tiles in our kitchen with hardwood. I would absolutely recommend them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for you kind words!  We are really happy to see that a wide plank  engineered hardwood flooring worked well for you and you really liked it. BC FLOORS Flooring Company, Vancouver

reviews.review_text: I had my carpet replaced with laminate floor by  BC FLOORS. Keit is the project manager who is very helpful, competent and knowledgeable about flooring products. She answered the my questions. She shown me the  showroom where vast  selection of  Laminate floor. She was consistent with updates and progress of  the Project. She visited my place to make sure  my floor will be done on time. Caloy and Emerson are reliable, punctual and professional. They know what theyre doing. They did an excellent job updating my flooring and Im  happy with the result. They finished the  floor installation on  scheduled. I would highly recommend them. Thank you again Keit, Caloy and Emerson!!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your kind words. I ll let Keit, Caloy and Emerson know.

reviews.review_text: Lawrence as the Project Manager and Caloy as the installer did a great job for my new laminate flooring. They are very skillful and knowledge. I am very happy with the result. Definitely  will work with them for the next flooring projects.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for you kind words

reviews.review_text: I wanted to replace my wall to wall carpet in a 2 bedroom fully furnished Vancouver condo. Although not recommended and quite difficult to do the team at BC Floors pulled together and advised me how to make it happen. From the moment I met Keit, the company rep and project manager I knew I was in good hands. Also the installers Bijon and Korish were obvious trade professionals and the best in the business. The floor job looked totally amazing in the end. I would highly recommend this company and they have experience in condos and strata rules .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: I recently purchased some vinyl plank flooring for a small home renovation from BC Floors. Sophie and Nikita provided excellent customer service when was looking for vinyl plank flooring.  I was able to find the right flooring that met my needs and budget at BC Floors.  Even though I did not have my floors installed by them, they promptly answered any questions (email or tel) I had about installation and other queries. I would highly recommend BC Floors to anyone looking for new flooring. I had a very positive experience here.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much for your kind words.

reviews.review_text: Working with BC Floors was simple and straight forward. I worked with Keit Gutierrez who is very knowledgeable and kept me informed at every step of the way. I was traveling while some of the work was underway and she kept me up to date by sending photos as the work progressed. Highly recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much.

reviews.review_text: The project manager, Eric, was very organized, friendly, and professional.  He orchestrated various trades such as tilers, plumbers, painters, drywallers, and so forth to install our flooring.  This included water proof laminate in our legal basement suite and a quartz counter top.  Our main floor tile was replaced to create a more modern feel in conjunction with our hardwood while our en-suite bathroom was completely re-formed into a beautiful Roman inspired modern bathroom! Eric went above and beyond helping us during our three month renovation and was able to problem solve using evidence based rational thought instead of  winging  it or just  going with his gut.   This resulted in solid solutions at reasonable prices.  Although the renovations weren t cheap, the price for quality of work (and we chose higher end materials) was worth it.  As has been said, you can have something cheap, fast, and correct but you can only ever get two of the three so if you want a quality job at a reasonable price then it might take a little longer but if you remain flexible, then it s worth it in the end. Thanks to Eric and BC Floors and we will definitely recommend them to friends and family!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: From front to back, working with BC Floors was great. Sales rep Will was professional and was in estimating within a couple days of the initial call. I had 3 quotes for the laminate flooring in my new home and BC Floors came in the most cost effective. The installation of the actual floor was scheduled within a day or two of my original target date which was impressive as there was little time to turn the project around. The actual installation went smoothly and the end product looks great. I will definitely be recommending this company to friends and family.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Many thanks, Mike! We were very happy to assist you and meet your expectations. All the best to you!

reviews.review_text: We had BC Floors replace the tile floor in our apartment kitchen, and the carpet in the bedroom. They also sanded and refinished the oak floors in the hallway and living room. Everything was done as described, on time, and for a reasonable price.  We would definitely recommend them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much for your kind words

reviews.review_text: I was highly impressed with professionalism and variety of accommodation and customization offered by BC Floors team. They understood my needs and requirements for my project which ultimately lead to maximizing the appraisal/resale value of my property far beyond the cost of materials and installation. In fact, I love my house so much, Im not sure if I should sell anymore... the quality of material and installation are much better than any new construction homes I ve seen. The care and detail that went into making sure I m satisfied with the end result at my home wouldn t come even close to what s becoming a more common build fast/sell faster development projects out there. I m truly impressed and confident that my floors will continue looking great for a long time to come; also looking forward to working with BC Floors again on my other properties! Thanks guys and keep up the good work!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your business

reviews.review_text: Had the best experience with these folks! Eric guided us through the process seamlessly, even though we were out of province at the time. He managed everything from A to Z, the workmanship was A++ and the floors he helped us choose were absolutely gorgeous (and within our budget). He continuously went above and beyond what was laid out in the contract, even recommending (and managing) a painter to us and assisting with the transfer of keys. As first-time home buyers/renovators, we had plenty of silly questions, but he answered them all cheerfully and completely. Cant recommend highly enough!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much for your kind words

reviews.review_text: BC Floors did a fantastic job on our floors. Oleg & Max are true craftsmen. Prices are competitive, materials are great quality, but what really sets them apart is the workmanship. Truly amazing installation job. They were also fast, on time, and clean. They also kept us up to date with clear communication, exactly what you want from a contractor. Would not hesitate to recommend to anyone.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your business and for the time to leave a review Corey!  We really appreciate hearing positive input on flooring services provided.  On a personal note it was a pleasure to deal with both of you. Flooring Installation via glue down method is our specialty. Sincerely, BC FLOORS FLOORING COMPANY

reviews.review_text: I heard about BC Floors from my close friend. She used their services once and was pleased with the outcome. My apartment laminate flooring needed an upgrade and BC Floors did a great job supplying and installing the new one. I started with an in-home estimation which was truly helpful. Two weeks later I had my floors done, very well done. The service was good from the start to finish. Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for choosing BC FLOORS for your flooring project

reviews.review_text: Had my condo floors replaced by BC Floors last month & was very happy with their service, quality & professionalism. Eric was very knowledgeable and helped me chose the right product in the colour I was looking for; was always quick to respond & keep me updated as to the status of my project; and made every effort to arrange for a quick  install to happen when it was the most convenient. The installer Idris was also very professional and accomodating. Both were very detail oriented & great to deal with. Would highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much for the 5 star review.

reviews.review_text: Excellent work! Our project manager - Walter, was very professional and quick to respond to inquiries and accommodate requests. The installer was equally professional and courteous with excellent attention to detail. Despite very tight timelines they were able to demo and install floors for our entire home before we moved in and they look amazing. I would definitely recommend BC Floors!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your business!

reviews.review_text: Highly recommend BC Flooring for your next flooring job. Courteous, punctual and professional.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: We had to re-carpet our bedroom and our friends recommended we call BC Floors. The guys were very helpful over the phone and then later when they came down for an estimate of work load and pricing.  The installation work was pushed back a couple of times due to my hectic schedule and an unexpected business trip out of town, but they were very accommodating every time (Thanks again Maxim and Oleg!).  The guys are very professional, knowledgeable and super efficient - cant say enough how easy it was to deal with them! We love our new fluffy carpet, now the room is the best-looking one in the whole house :) We just couldnt be more pleased with the results! Highly recommend to anyone in need of a floor makeover!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your comment. We are always glad to accommodate our customers needs. Enjoy your new fluffy carpet for many years to come.

reviews.review_text: BC Floors recently removed my old, cracked ceramic tile flooring and installed luxury vinyl plank flooring and I couldnt be more thrilled with the result! They quoted 3 days for the work to be completed but got it all done in 2 (which was fantastic because our home is quite... um... cosy). Paul was an utter delight to consult with and Sheldon and the other installers were lovely as well. Ill definitely hire them again for any future flooring fixes.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your business

reviews.review_text: EXCELLENT WORK! We recently moved and wanted to update our new home. We contacted BCFloors based on their reviews and we have been very pleased. We replaced carpet, tiles and glossy outdated maple floors with contemporary wide plank natural oak. The workmanship was outstanding and all the staff were very good to deal with. The stairs are especially beautiful. If you are looking for a good company look no further! Thank you Oleg and Max. Alex and Joanne Rose West Vancouver, BC
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Joanne and Alex!  Thank you for your business and your patience!

reviews.review_text: We recently updated our condo with new carpeting and tile flooring from BC Floors. Walter was very helpful and gave good advice on helping us choose the appropriate products, was available for questions that came up and made sure we were happy with the installation. It looks great! Thanks Walter.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much.

reviews.review_text: I have a rental unit in Vancouver and work most of the time in Calgary. The floors in the unit really needed to be replaced so I called BC Floors. They are very helpful - we chose the flooring through emails (they had tons of options and recommendations). We went for vinyl planks. They had everything arranged with my current tenants. Great work, good timing, excellent service. Thank you for your help!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for choosing us for your flooring project!

reviews.review_text: I had to replace my carpet floors and decided to go with laminate. BC Floors representative did a great job of helping me with the choice of color and the width. They were very responsive, they were on time and did a quality job overall. I love my new floors. Thank you very much - BC Floors!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for choosing BC FLOORS.

reviews.review_text: Kiran was an amazing person to deal with from day 1. She was very helpful, resourceful and very accommodating with all our requests. We are very happy with her services. Kiran helped us a lot and everything went very smoothly. The installer that we got his name is Able. He is absolutely the best. So professional, so knowledgeable and truly pro at what his does. Could not ask for better one. He is amazing!!! Job was done in 3 days as planned with no issues. Now we really hope that no issues will arise with the floor after the install after a few months or years. But everything looks good so far. We really enjoying our newly installed floor. Thank you to BC floors, specifically for Kiran and Able. Amazing team :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: BC flooring well done, thanks a lot to Keit(project manager)and all the crew
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: Called BC Floors to replace my existing carpet with the engineered hardwood floors in my two bedrooms. I was presented with a wide range of options and was able to choose the best suitable colour and texture for my new floor. It took a week from posted order till I had hardwood surface installed. Jobsite was left clean and floors look great. Thank you BC Floors. One great flooring company in Vancouver! Thx
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We truly appreciate your review and confident that chosen hardwood will last for a very long time. Thank you for your business.

reviews.review_text: Our floors were done last summer by Oleg and Maxim.  They worked fast, clean and very professional. It is such a great and friendly team. They fixed our stairs after we dropped down a heavy furniture from upstairs all the way to downstairs. They matched parts of wood so well, so it looks great as before! They did a great job!!! Thank you guys. I would definitely call them again if I will need their help in the future!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much, we value your opinion. We are happy to hear that we met your expectations! Thank you!

reviews.review_text: I had a flood and needed my kitchen, hallway, living-room and bedroom floor redone. the team at BC Floors (Oleg, Max and Leo) were fantastic, Oleg came out the day I called to see my place and I received a quote a day later.   They also spent time helped me pick the right floor (hardwood vs laminate). Max was very friendly and always communicated well and let me know about the progress and levelling before they proceeded to make sure I was in agreement with the costs   Leo worked extremely hard (staying late and weekends) to get my floors done in less time than originally estimated. Leo really has a talent for flooring  I would highly recommend the whole team. i love my floors and dealing with BC floors made the whole project easy and stress free. They cleaned up everything and very very knowledgeable and quick with all their communication. I have already recommended them to my friends and family
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Tess for you kind words. It is a pleasure to hear that we met your expectations. Please enjoy your new oak engineered hardwood flooring. BC FLOORS Flooring Company www.bcfloors.ca

reviews.review_text: We wanted out floors re-stained to a darker color and needed it done super quickly. These guys were super responsive and got the job done a day earlier than we expected. The floors also came out beautifully. I highly recommend them if for no other reason than they got the job done faster than they said they could which never happens. They definitely know what they are doing, too, when it comes to wood floors.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for choosing BC Floors

reviews.review_text: Ive got nothing but good things to say about my experience at BC FLOORS. Im a contractor and needed flooring kind of last minute... Ive dealt with Mansur at the store and all I can say is that I received the best service Ive gotten in a long time, period. Not only did he manage to get all my nosings and trims done in a week instead of waiting 3 weeks, but he also picked it up himself from Richmond and brought it to the Burnaby location so it was more convenient for me. He also answered all my questions, phone calls and I dont know how many texts we exchanged off business hours, on the weekend etc... Im taking 5 minutes today to write this review because I feel he went above and beyond and that needs to be told.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much

reviews.review_text: Paul and the team at BC Floors were great to work with. I had a very tight timeline and Paul pulled all the strings to make it happen, a true miracle worker. I am very happy with the results. Fantastic job and highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thank you for your business and trusting us your floors!

reviews.review_text: Thank you B.C. Flooring for doing such an amazing job putting in my new flooring!! Keit and Emerson are great to work with and I am so thankful I found such friendly people that care about satisfying their customers. Thank you !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much. I ll let Keit and Emerson know for sure.

reviews.review_text: I had these guys do the floors for my townhouse and they did a fantastic job. Super fast and affordable. Keit is really nice and attentive and Caloy and Emerson are masters at their craft. Would highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your very kind words. Will surely let Keit, Caloy and Emerson know.

reviews.review_text: Thank you Keit for your customer service, work ethics and  follow up. Great! The work was completed on time as per the commitment. Happy to seek their assistance in future if required. Thanks
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: I had my hardwood floors redone in a house that was built in the 50s. Cezary came out for a quote and Claudio did the refinishing. Both were very professional and delivered what they promised. I would definitely use them again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your business Kris!

reviews.review_text: As a professional floor layer with verified 25yrs in the business, I have noticed how demanding customers can indeed be with unrealistic expectations. BC Floors has an exceptional reputation dating back approx 20 yrs, for which I have installed for them the last 1.5 yrs. I have run the gauntlet of numerous shops in the lower mainland with  a much less professional appeal as opposed to BC Floors, who are very business minded. Customers that compose mean spirited reviews instead of being grown up enough as an adult to avoid appearing vindictive, childish, infantile and just plain dishonest simply because they are paying?!. This type of demeanour and or deceptive mentality, was not so prevalent back in the early 1980s, when customers were much more Civil & Understanding.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: BC Floors restored our original oak hardwood (from 1926) as well as some newer oak floors. The floors look amazing and the attention to detail was outstanding. We have a gas fireplace standing on the wood floor and despite having to carefully restore the wood around this piece the floors look beautiful. Thank you.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Marianne, for your business! We love old wood floors :)

reviews.review_text: We have a commercial building in Vancouver with a large 3,400 sq foot wooden floor that needed a lot of work.  BCFloors after much sanding was able to restore the floor completely.  It looks like a brand new floor!  Thanks BCFloors for your great expertise restoring old wood floors!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your business

reviews.review_text: The best people to deal with! BC Floors has a helpful and friendly sales process and an efficient, dedicated, and high quality installation. They went well beyond what I was expecting.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Brett for your kind words

reviews.review_text: Staff is friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable. Oleg answered all of my questions, and helped me make the right choices for my project. I would definitely recommend BC Floors to family and friends. Mel Cruz homeowner
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mel!

reviews.review_text: We recently had our entire third floor and main floor (including two sets of winding stairs) re-done by BC Floors.  Keit was very knowledgeable and easy to work with.  The team of installers were fantastic and very friendly.  Our new floors look fantastic.  I am very happy with the results and the quote I was given for the job was pretty much right on.  Thank you for doing such an amazing job.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thank you for your business!

reviews.review_text: I had a positive experience working with BC Floors and they did a nice job replacing my carpet with laminate. I dealt with Lawrence and he was very good to work with responding in a timely manner. I will be going back for future flooring needs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thank you for your business!

reviews.review_text: Keit was very helpful and professional.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

reviews.review_text: Responsive, friendly staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for trusting us your hardwood floors!

reviews.review_text: Just got services completely finished today. Overall they were good and professional and I am happy with the final result. Of course, if you dont mind waiting for almost 3 months. I cannot even get my stairs done during on moving date, the installer came before Good Friday then told me that they were in short of a key material. The final invoice amount is much more higher than sales agreement, our sales agreement was $12,213.9 but I got charged $13,589.4 ($1,375.50 extra charge ) You wont be able to match the description on  invoice  and sales agreement, they look like two different cases. If you dont have any other choices, like myself, then yes go ahead with them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thank you for your business!

reviews.review_text: Friendly helpful and accommodating. Prices and selection were very competitive. Installed luxury vinyl plank. Interaction with staff in office and on site was good but project did take about 3 times longer than quoted. There was more leveling work than anticipated which added understandable time but there were delays due to running out of materials and conflicting schedules with other projects. They did confirm my painters could come paint mounted baseboards one day but painters had to go home when they showing up and baseboards had not been mounted as promised. Was also promised exact material match on stair noses but was told on day of install that it would be best match similar material. It looks great but misleading promise on sales floor. Translucent silicone used on edges of half the stairs and white caulk use on there half because they ran out of materials which looks strange now. Some risers have scuffs and glue marks. Also last minute changes from vinyl transition to metal transitions for technical reasons on slope of transition which should have been identified in two site visits before project started. They worked to rectify issue and supplied extra transitions so we can change them on our own in the future. Had a hard time getting all baseboards remounted as agreed and ended up remounting some on my own to save time on project and not have to keep asking. Had to point out several corrective action where material did not hide properly under baseboards, stairs etc. These were corrected quickly but ended up leaving some because I got tired of pointing them out and having to schedule site visits. Told me they would screw down plywood floors in areas that had squeaking but this not done. Quite a bit of scuffs on jewly painted walls and resedue of leveling compound on some walls which I had to scrape off.  I am very conflicted in this review because they did try there best to fix things but it seems like lots of the things should have just been done right the first time. We are happy with the floors and would have given a higher rating if we didnt have to go through the little stresses along the way. It may have just been a bad month but I would have a hard time referring them to friends and family after our experience. Bitter sweet unfortunately.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your business Adam! We did the best we can from our end

reviews.review_text: Installation was decent overall, but they messed up one of the rooms and had to cover it up with awkward looking panels near the edges where the floor ends at floor-to-ceiling windows. Other issues: - Original expectations were that they would do the kitchen flooring as well. But they bailed on doing the entire floor because of some custom cabinetry that is raised above the flooring on elevated stilts. So half of the kitchen flooring is incomplete (old flooring hidden under the cabinetry). Would have been much better to be up front about that at the beginning. - They promised to replace our baseboards, but during the renovations they said the original baseboards were fine and asked if they would just use those. We ask for them to go ahead with new ones thing they would do the full job. Instead they cut new baseboards without painting them properly and never added caulking. So we were left to do that our selves. - They messed up one of our closet doors (couldn t get it to fit back in) so they cut it. Now the one door doesn t match the height of the other. Overall, a lot of the issues could have been prevented with better communication on their part before and during the project. They also rushed at the end to finish up. We offered to give them more time, but they already had other projects waiting to go right afterwards.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Steve, I apologize for this. My team has been reaching out to you but you haven t replied. Can you please reply to our team so they can discuss how we can correct ? Thanks

reviews.review_text: I have a small job on floor tile replacement. Contacted them and they came over for estimates which was a certain amount. Then, I contacted them again saying I want to go ahead with the work and ask for a final estimate. That guy said he will give it to me next day which he never did. Then I contacted him again, he texted me the labour cost which was 500 dollars more than what he told me . I asked perhaps theres a mistake? He never replied .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: I apologized for this. Usually for small jobs, jobs are normally quoted based on piecework rather than $ per square foot as mobilization costs for small jobs and medium jobs are almost the same. Nevertheless, I will find out who and will make sure that this will never happen again.

reviews.review_text: DO NOT even think about BC Floors. I had the most horrible experience with BC floors. They basically act as middle man and subcontract your project to others that literally have no knowledge of flooring and they will ruin your material and flooring. First off, I had to call Keit, the project manager to give me a quote, literally everyday two to three times. After a full week of calling her, she finally gave me a sloppy quote without coming to my place to see what the scope is. I had a tight schedule and made the worst mistake to pay them to do the job. Then their subcontractor came to my place without knowing what the scope of work is. He was supposed to remove the existing flooring on the stairs and install new stairs using the materials I have bought. He totally damaged all of the stairs while removing the existing stairs and noted that the floors now need leveling and demanded more money. As I was deep into this mistake, I agreed. Then he installed all flooring and stairs wrong and ruined the whole floor and stairs. The stairs nosing fell off after 2 days and I noticed that it is sitting on a hollow space!!! The flooring moves when I walk on it. When I complained to Keit, BC Floors PM, she accused me that I am lying. I had to fight a whole week with BC floors to prove that their subcontractor has ruined my materials and the stairs. After fighting for over a week and getting penny pinched along the way and arguing with me over every $10 I paid, I ONLY got around 88% of my money back and NOT the full payment. I have already spent more than $1000 out of pocket and still need to find another contractor to fix my stairs. I have never experienced such horrible service and customer service. So, if you really value your time and money, I recommend finding another company for your floors. Otherwise, you will end up losing lots of money and time.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Maryam, I have discussed this issue with your husband Graham and we have agreed on the compensation and I have already returned your money. I do sincerely apologize this.

reviews.review_text: Small job changing carpeted rooms to floorboards. Prompt reply with email and phone.  Rocked up to find out the guy I had been in contact with is the only one guy does the estimates and that he wasn t in the store. Apparently it s by appointment only. Was told to come anytime. Up selling by the lady who was there with nonchalant attitude. No thanks.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: I apologize for this. Even though your job is small, please understand that we care for all customers no matter the size of the job. You can come any time to view the materials but it does not mean the guy you are speaking with is there as he manages projects as well. It means that there is someone who is always there at the showroom. Please understand that estimating is an art and not something exact and maybe you misunderstood that the lady is up selling you. She is also an estimator but may not be familiar with your case. In construction, every project is unique. It is best that you speak with the guy you normally speak so things will be consistent. Again, my apologies

reviews.review_text: As it stands, weve paid $3,500 in labour and lost $1,000 in materials for BC Floors to destroy our staircase. Keit and Nikita are dodging our calls and buying time and only giving half solutions. The latest solution was a mismatched repair where the stairs dont match the rest of our flooring. The stairs were installed 3 weeks ago and already 2 steps have come apart, with the nosing starting to peel off other stairs. The stair nosing came with a reinforcement track, the installer threw that out. Unbelievably unprofessional, not a company you want to do business with. We called them 4 days ago, they did not take our complaints seriously, until their inhouse person came by and confirmed the stairs were a disaster. They have now admitted fault, but cant provide us a timely solution, they just keep buying time.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Graham, I apologize for this and I have returned your money as agreed including material compensation.

reviews.review_text: We paid over $5,000 to have our hardwood floors sanded and 3 coats of Bona Traffic HD applied which was supposed to help protect our floor from scratches from our dogs.  14 months later, the floor is horribly scratched already.  It has also changed colors under a kitchen carpet. I emailed the company advising them of the challenges we have had  together with pictures, and they said that the warranty had expired after one year.  I let them know that we had delayed coming to them as I wanted to wait until a lengthy renovation was completed.  I tried making the case that the damage that was evident in the pictures had obviously developed over the past 14 months instead of over the last two months.  I suspect they only applied one coat of protection instead of the three.  Unfortunately, no subsequent response from the company.  I sent another email asking that this be escalated to a manager.  Again no response.  Very very disappointed.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear you had a frustrating experience, but we really appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention. That will never happen again.

reviews.review_text: I had the worst of luck with this company. I don t blame them with any malice. I think they ve been professional, but that doesn t change the fact my experience was... bad. I was asking them to renovate a carpet on behalf of a client in Burnaby (this was for an apartment with 2 small bedrooms) and I had a good first impressions. The salesman was friendly, I liked their carpet selection and I do like the job their installer did and the final result. To be clear, this company does good work. The carpet itself is beautiful. So I don t think they are normally incompetent like this. However, the salesman I had ... well I think he was a fine guy and he had good carpet recommendations. The issue was he messed up. First of all, he forgot to account the long weekend messing up carpet deliveries which pushed the project back. That... was okay since he let me know ASAP and got the carpet to the installer. So I ve forgiven him for that. The main reason for my poor review is the fact he grossly miscalculated the amount of carpet needed. He gave us a quote for 2000 cad which was around what the other companies in the area offered. However, we needed 54 yards, he estimated 34. This meant that the project needed an additional 1170 Canadian, bringing up the project to 3170 cad. The company did give me a discount of 170 dollars, which was appreciated, but this sudden extra 1000 dollar cost is not welcome. I understand the company s position, but this was a hell of a mistake. We honestly would not have chosen this company if the actual quote was presented upfront. Furthermore, we chose them with the understanding that two bedrooms would be completed... not one. Edit: After re-measuring and re-reading the original contract I realized that while there was an opportunity for me to actually catch the mistake. However, the fact that a professional and who came and measured the apartment and yet messed the estimate up that badly is still outrageous, and it doesn t change the fact that the initial quote was completely off by more than 50% of the cost. ADDITIONALLY, the contract says 2 bedrooms. The fact that they messed up how much carpet to order should not be up to me, but on the company representative who ordered the carpet and made the contract with the understanding that that amount of carpet was enough. However, I also realized that he contract itself had one huge issue in which it isnt actually clear about how much carpet was supposed to be installed. It listed a number of yards of carpet, which I originally thought referred to length of the roll. The issue is... yards to this company means yards squared.... which... is... just not clear.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear you had a frustrating experience, but we really appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention. That will never happen again.
